title: Crime Alert 04.03.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.03.19
description:
A U.S. tourist allegedly steals a piece of the historic train tracks where victims were unloaded at the Auschwitz concentration camp.  El Chapo and his wife plan to launch a fashion label, from jail. And founder of phony blood test company Theranos, is engaged.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
